fic Daylight Time,

And some of us are l=
ogical and read other material besides tribal  
religion. Care to do any lo=
gical debates Im up for it. 

Frank  your reference to "Modern" beliefs are=
 wrong I assume you classify 
me as  a newager. I think you may have a cool=
 box, but please don't think 
that  makes you an expert on tribal religon v=
ersus Quantum physics.
 
Personally I believe the god of the bible is a sav=
age evil god who  really 
is the devil...if he were real. Don't beieve me? =
Have you ever  read the old 
testament? Did you know that over 400 virgin g=
irls were  given to the 
priests during one raid for slavery? Hmmm, I wonde=
r what  those holy priests used 
so many little girls for?
 
Could you go i=
nto a town and murder all women and children (drive  swords 
thu them) and =
then take them outside and put them in a pile and  burn them? 
Does that so=
und like a loving god? The hebrews were wild  savages that 
decimated a tow=
n, commited atrocities worse than hitler all  in the name of what a 
self p=
roclaimed Jealous god?
 
stick to your box but please don't try to save us =
from the  
anti-christ.stick to your box but please don't try to save us fr=
om the  

Research Constantine, he was the gay emperor that killed his wife=
,  brother 
and son and chose to put together the books of the new  testame=
nt. He 
required that all believe and follow this religion or be  put to de=
ath. 
 
Im just saying that this group is about EVP not about snowfire  sav=
ing our 
sould from the debil.

 =


Easy to claim one is all modern and sophisticated, that all  is known, 
t=
here are no demons, gods,or angels. Easy to forget, modern  man doesn't kno=
w 
squat! All your science, all your universities, all  your "logic"--nothi=
ng! 
Y'all don't know anythin'!
 
 Awhile back I had an experience where I =
was  awakened in the middle of the 
night to what seemed to be some  entity=
 crawling up inside my body starting 
at my feet, accompanied by  weird vis=
ions/hallucinati ons, unable to move. 
Easy to dismiss as  dreams, maybe a =
bit of undigested beef-to quote scrooge, 
but none of  my usual protection =
stuff worked, till I thought "Jesus!" The 
thing  lifted it's head and took=
 off. I'm still not a believer, but I'm not 
a  total rejector either. Ther=
e has been times when I needed "His" help,  
and was answered, plus, what I=
 guess were angels, in open air "Frank,  He 
heard you". I don't believe in=
 the church crap, but God is out  there!  Not only 
that, is been ":scienti=
fically" -as close to  -proven as possible-- that 
the Shoud of Turin is in=
 fact waht it  appears to be--Jesus! Same question, 
what the hell kind of =
evidence  will you find acceptable?
 
 Some here will still insist all is k=
nown, and they are in  fact the most 
advanced being the universe has ever =
seen--they have a  great deal to learn! 
I try to tolerate their arrogance,=
 but my  patience is gone for that stuff. 
When they get over their name  c=
alling, maybe they will be allowed to post. 
 
 Frank-S

their is no  antic=
hrist, no devil, no anthropomorphic hebrew savage god who  
commands his pe=
ople to murder children and women in one town  and in the next 
town kill a=
ll but virgin girls (old  testament). 

I would say that there is only  con=
sciousness, not confined to any man made 
 religion.

with love,
Russ
